title: Un Style Eh Power Lyrics Sakalakala Vallavan Appatakkar Song Lyrics

Song: Un Style Eh Power

Un style Eh power
Naa public Figure
Unna chatting dating Panna poren da

Sadhikaari Sadhikaari en mela
thadumaari Vizhundhaye
Manasil Ezhundhaye
Hey Kadaak dhadaakunu thondai adaikudhu
Vedi chedikunu aasai Vedikudhu raasa
Mutham kodu maasa

Hey Madak madakunu mutham kudikure
Dhiduk dhidukuna aagudhu lesa

Oru cycle pola enna otture
Andha sorgathe kannula kaature

Hey kaadu medu pallam ellam enna kootu suthuriye
Kadhal ooru poga solli kaadhu kulla kathuriye
kaadhal krathagiye

thadumaari Vizhundhaye
Manasil Ezhundhaye

Ada Kadhal vandhadhum konja kooda thoongula
Ippa naama aadurom rendu forign songu la
Innum flight erala naama visa vaangala
Indha kadhaluku sattam edhumilla
Un Pecha kettadhum vera yedhum ketala
Naa unna paarthadhum vera onnayum kannu parkala
Yen sundi vitta kaasa pola

Senju parka thudikudhu
